fields.name: name
fields.label: Section Name
fields.description: The label shown for this section in the Content Tree

fields.name: enumDescriptions
fields.label: Enter a description to be displayed below the text

fields.name: enumIconNames
fields.label: Icon
fields.description: Enter the name of the icon. list-search

fields.name: mandatoryMessage
fields.label: Error message
fields.description: Error message shown when required field is left empty.

fields.label: Script validation message
fields.description: Displayed when validation script fails.

fields.name: minimumDate
fields.label: Minimum date
fields.description: Minimum date allowed in the field

fields.name: minimumMessage
fields.label: Minimum error message
fields.description: Error message shown when the date entered is before the minimum date.

fields.name: maximumDate
fields.label: Maximum date
fields.description: Maximum date allowed in the field

fields.name: maximumMessage
fields.label: Maximum error message
fields.description: Error message shown when the date entered is after the maximum date.

fields.label: Maximum repetitions
fields.description: Maximum number of times the panel can appear on the form. No value indicates no limit.

fields.name: yearMin
fields.label: Year lower boundary
fields.description: Lower boundary for year. Could be 1980, or -/+45. Default is 20 years in the past.

fields.name: yearMax
fields.label: Year upper boundary
fields.description: Upper boundary for year. Could be 2030, or -/+45. Default is current year.
